results.content: I found the course clear and easy to understand. The part I liked the most was the creation of the extension to get the key vaults. It would be nice to add a GitHub repository with the course code. I highly recommend it to all .Net developers who want to learn about Azure.
results.content_html: I found the course clear and easy to understand. The part I liked the most was the creation of the extension to get the key vaults. It would be nice to add a GitHub repository with the course code. I highly recommend it to all .Net developers who want to learn about Azure.

results.content:
I gave Jonas 5 stars because he is providing a unique value to the community with this niche content.

However, this is a fast-moving target, and there is _currently_ no coverage of MSI or how this applies in an Azure Functions environment (which is understandingly beyond his originally intended scope).

I would also expect a GitHub repo to access the latest sample code that he references in his course.
